hooks.name: rubocop-format-on-edit
hooks.description: Run RuboCop autofix on edited Ruby files
hooks.command: bundle exec rubocop -A $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS 2>/dev/null | grep -E '^[^#].*:[0-9]+:[0-9]+:' | head -10 || true

hooks.name: syntax-check-on-edit
hooks.description: Run Ruby syntax check after edits
hooks.command: for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do ruby -c "$f" 2>&1 | grep -v 'Syntax OK'; done || true

hooks.name: pre-commit-quality-gate
hooks.description: Full quality check before git commits
hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'git commit'; then bundle exec rubocop && bundle exec rspec; fi
